abstract.p: Sampling of recent home sales in New York City metropolitan area; photos; charts (M)

block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,800-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, elevator attendants, marble baths, h/w floors, oversize windows, corner unit; common charges $1,544; taxes $17,434; listed at $1.95 million, 12 weeks on market (Brokers: Sandy Neuringer & Associates; Markgraf Group)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,800-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, elevator attendants, marble baths, h/w floors, oversize windows, corner unit; common charges $1,544; taxes $17,434; listed at $1.95 million, 12 weeks on market (Brokers: Sandy Neuringer & Associates; Markgraf Group)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, high ceilings, renovated kitchen and bath, south exposure; maintenance $1,232, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $387,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,900-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; dining area, high ceilings, h/w floors, fireplace, 2 exposures; common charges $454; taxes $4,707; listed at $1.095 million, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,175-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; dining foyer, renovated windowed kitchen, h/w floors, 3 exposures; maintenance $871, 56% tax-deductible; listed at $629,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 725-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, bay window, health club, Central Park view; common charges $571; taxes $8,127; listed at $555,000, 1 week on market (Brokers: Bette Bregman; Mitsui)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; dining area, library, c/a, balcony, direct waterfront including boat mooring on L.I. Sound; pool and paddle tennis courts in complex; common charges $550; taxes $1,500; listed at $325,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall)

4-bedroom, 1-bath frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, washer/ dryer, tin ceilings, parquet floors, enclosed front porch, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,500; listed at $350,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a prewar building; dining room, high ceilings, h/w floors, fireplace, private roof rights; maintenance $677, 53% tax-deductible; listed at $429,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Warren Lewis)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, private garden; common charges $340; 100% tax exemption; listed at $350,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

2-family, 55-year-old attached house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, dining room, h/w floors, new windows in each unit; 22-by-104-ft. lot; taxes $1,924; listed at $319,900, 7 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, attached prewar brick house; dining room, h/w floors, finished basement, rear deck, 1-car garage, 18-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,012; listed at $319,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Sarah Jones)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 673-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; renovated kitchen, h/w floors, new appliances, patio, library in complex; maintenance $401, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $32,500, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Gateway Arms)

4-bedroom, 2-bath, 30-year-old 2-story bayfront contemporary; dining area, wraparound decks, outdoor shower, water views, 60-by-80-ft. lot; taxes $4,600; listed at $450,000, 15 weeks on market (Broker: Don Goldman)

3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 41-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, basement, fireplace, 1-car garage, 60-by-135-ft. lot; taxes $6,000; listed at $369,000, 1 week on market (Brokers: Sandsport; Coach/Blaich

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 13-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, basement, fireplace, 2-car attached garage, pool, 0.52-acre lot; taxes $10,700; listed at $439,000, 20 weeks on market (Brokers: National Homefinders; Coach)

4-bedroom, 3-bath, 50-year-old Cape Cod; dining area, renovated kitchen and baths, family room, den, 2 fireplaces, 3-car garage, 3.02-acre lot; taxes $5,169; listed at $459,900, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

5-bedroom, 6 1/2-bath, 13-year-old contemporary; marble foyer, dining room, eat-in kitchen, 2 family rooms, skylights, 2 hot tubs, 3 fireplaces, 3-car garage, 4.41-acre lot; taxes $15,093; listed at $1.99 million, 32 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 12-year-old colonial; marble foyer, eat-in kitchen with center island, family room, fireplace, 1-acre lot; taxes $7,199; listed at $450,000, 15 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; ReMax/Right Choice)

1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 16-year-old ranch-style condo; dining area, h/w floors, full attic, carport; common charges $139; taxes $2,238; listed at $201,500 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Brokers: Realty Seven/Wilton; Coldwell Banker/Wilton)

2-bedroom, 1-bath, 60-year-old co-op; entry foyer, dining room, modern kitchen, beach rights; monthly maintenance $778, 48% tax deductible; listed at $122,900, 35 weeks on market (Brokers: Century 21 Deed; Prudential Ragette)

5-bedroom, 3-bath, 14-year-old contemporary; cathedral ceilings, dining room, deck, eat-in kitchen, family room, fireplace, attached 2-car garage; 0.28-acre lot; taxes $13,093; listed at $749,000, 25 weeks on market (Brokers: Weichert; Merritt)

3-bedroom, 3-bath, 32-year-old raised ranch; cathedral ceilings, fireplace, hardwood floors, greenhouse, eat-in kitchen, family room, deck, 2-car garage; 1.2-acre lot; taxes $5,800; listed at $315,000, 21 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)
2-bedroom, 2-bath, 11-year-old town house condo; fireplace, cathedral ceilings, deck, c/a; common charges $177; taxes $1,639; listed at $149,900 (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Broker: Weichert)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 16-year-old colonial; c/a, h/w floors, full finished basement, family room with fireplace, 0.34-acre lot; taxes $7,239; listed at $365,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Richard A. Weidel Corporation)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 35-year-old split-level; in-ground pool, c/a, fireplace, 2-car garage, security system, 0.76-acre lot; taxes $8,023; listed at $489,000, 2 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Weichert)
4-bedroom, 3-bath, 19-year-old colonial; deck, 2-car garage, family room, eat-in kitchen, 0.98-acre lot; taxes $6,638; listed at $349,900, 8 1/2 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)
